summary: This is an email chain between Audrey Strauss and other US Attorney's Office (USANYS) personnel discussing an update on a FOIA response related to the Epstein case. The correspondence indicates internal coordination about briefing materials and legal strategy regarding potential document production on reconsideration.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Recipient and participant in email chain regarding Epstein FOIA update, requests materials to review over the weekend.

events.title: FOIA Response Discussion
events.description: Internal email discussion among US Attorney's Office personnel about the Epstein FOIA response and whether more documents might be produced on reconsideration.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain from April 2021 regarding FOIA matters related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Audrey Strauss, then Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York, is involved in the correspondence.
The discussion concerns legal strategy about potential additional document production in response to a FOIA request.
The email indicates the Court perceived a possibility of more documents being produced on reconsideration.
The correspondence shows internal coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office on Epstein-related FOIA issues.
